ai-patthana24.19:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: Protector of the World, circumstances, and tangledges of clothes.
ai-patthana24.19:1.1_0: or is the condition for the deathless condition.
ai-patthana24.19:1.1_1: One is named brief, and one who has produced objects,
ai-patthana24.19:2.1_0: or what is not known as the teaching,
ai-patthana24.19:3.1_0: You don’t give rise to the cause or reason for this.
ai-patthana24.19:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana24.19:3.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana24.19:4.1_0: It is not the condition for the refuge, nor for the taking away of the Dhamma, nor for the purpose of investigating the teaching.
ai-patthana24.19:4.1_1: It is not the condition for the deathless that is a condition for the arising of refuge, for the sake of the teaching, and for the object.
ai-patthana24.19:4.1_2: When there are two kinds of support: on account of the meditation subject, there is a single one that is, non-human beings.
ai-patthana24.19:5.1_0: Not gone for refuge to the teaching, or to the flood and only gives rise to floods.
ai-patthana24.19:5.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana24.19:5.1_2: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana24.19:5.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana24.19:6.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for teaching.
ai-patthana24.19:6.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana24.19:7.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to the form for refuge.
ai-patthana24.19:7.1_1: One does not give rise to a refuge, with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana24.19:7.1_2: This is the cause of two reasons:
ai-patthana24.19:7.1_3: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana24.19:7.1_5: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana24.19:8.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to a refuge for the formless, with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana24.19:8.1_1: You shouldn’t give rise to a refuge for the formless, or the unrealized Dhamma.
ai-patthana24.19:8.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana24.19:9.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to refuge in the world. Seeking about the Teaching.
ai-patthana24.19:9.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
ai-patthana24.19:10.1_0: When you don’t go for refuge, with the supermundane conditions,
ai-patthana24.19:11.1_0: Not for refuge, there is no cause or reason for someone who is something else, their preferred to another.
ai-patthana24.19:11.1_1: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana24.19:11.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
ai-patthana24.19:12.1_0: Not for a lay follower or a teaching because of something connected with cause or reason,
ai-patthana24.19:12.1_1: ... five objects have the same object,
ai-patthana24.19:12.1_3: the five hindrances are not clear.
